importfrometherpad-desc: Create a wiki page from an etherpad
importfrometherpad-summary: Use this Special page to create a wiki page from an etherpad.
importfrometherpad-intro: Both etherpad classic and etherpad lite supported. The etherpad must be publicly available with no password.
importfrometherpad-nopermission: You must have createpage permission to use this feature.
importfrometherpad-append-or-replace-lab: Target page already exists. Would you like to append or replace?
importfrometherpad-sucessful-new: You have created a new page.
importfrometherpad-novalidexporturl: No valid etherpad export url found.
importfrometherpad-pandocerror: Error running pandoc command while converting content.
